description.value: You create a dome of brilliant light that destroys projectiles attempting to pass through it. Ammunition from physical ranged attacks—such as arrows, bolts, sling bullets, and other objects of similar size—is destroyed in a flash of light when it passes into or out of the globe's area. Attackers targeting creatures or objects through the globe's surface with physical ranged attacks must succeed at a Fortitude save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] for 1 round on a critical failure).
